features: Fixed Position, Low-Profile TV or Monitor Wall Mount with 1.3" Mounting Profile
Supports TVs up to 33 lbs and up to 32 inch. Supports 75x75 to 100x100mm VESA Mounting Patterns
Quick, Easy, and Secure Installation with Included Hardware
Must me affixed to a wall stud, or into solid wall (concrete, brick etc). Do not use anchors into drywall only.
body.description: SWIFT100-AP is a flat-to-wall, fixed-position TV wall mount or monitor wall mount for flat panel displays up 33 lbs (to 32”). Profile is only 1.3" from the wall for a sleek, low-profile installation. It is VESA compatible with hole patterns 75x75 and 100x100mm. The SWIFT100-AP flat-to-wall, fixed position TV bracket not only saves valuable shelf space or floor space, but it also safely secures your TV to the wall preventing it from accidentally tipping over. The easy to assemble design and the included hardware pack allows for quick, easy installation. Flat-to-Wall mounts are a great choice when low profile mounting is preferred, and when managing lighting / glare issues is not a priority. Dimensions: 4.58" x 4.58" x .1.3".

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Pictured: SWIFT100-AP SwiftMount Free up your living space and protect kids & pets from accidental tipping and falls with our range of TV Wall Mounts. TRIED & TESTED quality TV Wall Mounts at great prices 3 STEP INSTALLATIONS with easy-to-follow instructions SAFE AND SECURE with options for TVs up to 80" SwiftMount 100 / 110 / 140 TV Wall Mounts Suitable for MOST TVs and Monitors up to 32-inch SWIFT100-AP – Flat: Fixed position mounts are the best choice when sleek, low-profile installation is most important.SWIFT110-AP – Tilting: Best when mounting higher on a wall, and helps reduce light glare and reflections on your TV screen.SWIFT140-AP – Full Motion: Swivel, Tilt, and Extend Mount to manage glare, fine-tune viewing angle, and to use in or near corners. TV size ranges are shown for reference. Always check the VESA mounting pattern on the back of your TV to verify fit.

Check your TV VESA size to ensure compatibility Most TVs have 4 mounting holes on the rear of the TV known as a VESA mounting pattern. Your TV manual or specifications will usually state the VESA mounting specs, or you can measure the space between the mounting holes (in millimeters) horizontally, then vertically to find your size. SWIFT100/110/140 support the following VESA sizes: 75 x 75 mm 100 x 100 mm

You Can Do It! Installation Tips These hints and tips will help with the installation of your SwiftMount product: Remove dust from drill holes When affixing to a Wood Stud wall, make sure the lagbolt is in the center of the stud Tech Tip - for easier install, lubricate lagbolt thread with soap Tech Tip – Use a long screwdriver when tightening screws behind your TV Do NOT over-tighten TV hardware After installation, periodically check that nuts and bolts are tight Installation is Easy Always read the included instruction booklet before starting installation Wall mounting your TV is easy, and follows three steps: Fix VESA plate to the back of your TV (TV hardware included)Install the wall plate (Wood Stud and Solid Wall hardware included)Hang the TV onto the Wall Mount Make sure you have all the recommended tools before you start. We recommend a second person to help when installing larger TVs. You will not need all provided parts - we include hardware for a variety of TV sizes and wall types, so you will have parts left over.

Suitable for Wood Stud Walls and Solid Walls Hardware is included for Wood Stud walls and Solid Walls. Do not mount onto drywall without wood studs - use a Stud Finder before installation. Always check that your wall is suitable before installation, and void of any services (electric, gas, water, etc.)

SWIFT100-AP SWIFT110-AP SWIFT140-AP Function Flat Tilting Full Motion Recommended for A sleek, close-to-wall installation Reducing light glare and reflections, and for mounting higher on a wall Get a great view from multiple angles, and for mounting in or near a corner Max TV Size up to 32" / 81cm up to 32" / 81cm up to 32" / 81cm Max TV Weight 33lb / 15kg 33lb / 15kg 33lb / 15kg Compatible VESA Sizes 75 x 75mm, 100 x 100mm 75 x 75mm, 100 x 100mm 75 x 75mm, 100 x 100mm Min distance from wall 1.3" / 3.3cm 1.3" / 3.3cm 2.4" / 6cm Max distance from wall - - 11" / 28cm Screen Tilt - 15° down / 5° up 15° down / 5° up

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good for simple monitor install
reviews.reviewText: I needed a basic mount for a monitor. This was an economical solution. Easy to mount on wall and sturdy enough for small monitor.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 9, 2014
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great low-profile mount.
reviews.reviewText: This mount is an excellent buy for someone wanting to mount an LCD panel close to the wall. I have used some other low-profile mounts, and found this to be the best I have used. This was closer to the wall and easier to install.Pros:Very low profile - This is about as close to the wall as a mount can get. There about 1/3" of clearance.Sturdy materials - It is made of thick and sturdy stamped steel.Quality construction - The parts fit well together. There are no sharp edges or burs.Simple install - It was easy to level and to align and mate the two parts.Cons:None really.Here is a tip: before buying a low-profile mount, make sure all cords to your monitor come straight down and do not go back at all. If they go backwards, the monitor will probably not be able to mount on a low-profile mount.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 5, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Close and Tight Wall Mount
reviews.reviewText: Perfect for our purpose. Although extensible, flexible TV or monitor mounts are certainly more popular, sometimes you need a fixed, close, and tight mounted monitor. That was our case, with a small desk built into a wall in the kitchen. Reasonably easy to install. This mount frees up a lot of space on the desk top.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Ya can't argue with the price, but...
reviews.reviewText: Very sturdy and a simple install of the back plate. However, it's very difficult to get to the screws that hold the TV to the wall plate, especially because the depth is only 1-1/4" between the TV and the wall. I had to use an extended flexible shaft with a Phillips bit to get the final attachment screws in place. A bit tricky, but overall, it worked out well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 4, 2015
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Most flush mount I could find!
reviews.reviewText: Looking for a mount for the kitchen that does not stand out against the wall for under the cabinets. I was excited to find this until as it was the lowest profile I could find anywhere. We love the mount but did run into 2 issues. (1) The unit is meant to have the tv slide onto the unit from the top. This works well but since we were mounting it under the kitchen cabinets (and above the countertop) the cabinets themselves were in the way to slide it on from the top. We mount the unit sideways so we could slide the tv on the mount from the side. This means that the weight of the tv is not holding the tv on the mount as it should be. But we places a small shim on what should be the top of the mount (but is now the side for out application) and it is snug in there. We have no worries about it falling off the mount at all. The TV also is straight like this as well. (2) Since the unit is so flush to the wall, we could not install the HDMI cord because there is not enough room with the mount and wall for our particular tv. This was the same issue with the TV power cord. The HDMI and the tv power cords stuck out too far from the back of our tv to attach to this mount (not enough clearance). We fixed this by using mounting spacers to make the mount not as flush as it is intended to be. Works like a charm. For this price point, we were happy to make those very minor adjustments for our application. Would buy again and again!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 10, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Simple and effective
reviews.reviewText: The back plate match up perfectly with the holes in my monitor. The base plate is really sturdy and didn't budge where I mounted it. The tabs on the back plate slid in like butter when I mounted it onto the base plate. Overall this mount is an absolute steal at this price too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 6, 2016
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Check the specs on your tv before buying and you'll be fine. :)
reviews.reviewText: I got this after returning the SWIFT200 because it covered my audio/video jacks. This one is perfect for my Samsung UN28H4500 28-Inch Smart LED TV, is low profile while still allowing for the cords to be plugged in.Two things:1) I had to get longer M4 screws than what was provided. The manual for my tv recommended somewhere between #16 and #19, and I believe the screws included with this were #12. I bought a pack of #22's and haven't had a problem.2) I could *not* convince the screw to go into the wall anchor even though I lubricated the threads with dish soap as was recommended. I had to end up ripping the whole thing out of the wall, which left a pretty gnarly hole, causing me to have to move the mount over a bit. Not the end of the world, but still inconvenient. My tv isn't very heavy, so I ended up using a shorter screw and wall anchor and haven't had a problem.Overall, I recommend this and would buy it again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars waste of money
reviews.reviewText: it is too hard to hang the tv on the mount once you put it on the wall it took a ladder and a flashlight to install this and over an hour to try and get the srew and screw driver behind the tv to mount it. I would not recommend this product at all
